item.title: Ozzy Osbourne: Led Zeppelin Trial Was 'Waste of Fucking Time'
item.description:
Ozzy Osbourne: Led Zeppelin Trial Was 'Waste of Fucking Time'

Ozzy Osbourne weighs in on last month's Led Zeppelin trial, calling it a waste of time.

item.title: All you need to know about when to buy your Guns N' Roses Australian tour tickets
item.description:
All you need to know about when to buy your Guns N' Roses Australian tour tickets

It's official - Guns N' Roses are touring Australia in February. And it's more than half of the real Guns N' Roses, after Axl, Slash and Duff McKagan got back together and on the road in the US this year.

item.title: Confirmed: Guns N' Roses Are Bringing Their Tour Down Under
item.description:
Confirmed: Guns N' Roses Are Bringing Their Tour Down Under

Fans can officially start their countdown as the dates for the Australian leg of Guns N' Roses Not In This Lifetime tour were announced on Wednesday morning. Paul Dainty, president and CEO of music promoter TEG Dainty confirmed the news in a statement, revealing founder Axl Rose and former members, Slash and Duff McKagan who are currently completing the U.S.

item.title: See Inside Metallica's HQ as Lars Ulrich Talks Minneapolis Gig
item.description:
See Inside Metallica's HQ as Lars Ulrich Talks Minneapolis Gig

As Metallica gear up for their upcoming Minneapolis gig, which they will be live-streaming via Pandora at 9 p.m. CST on Saturday, August 20th, Lars Ulrich has made a video in the band's San Francisco headquarters, offering an intimate look at where they write and record.

item.title: Metallica: Hardwired (Official Music Video)
item.description:
Metallica: Hardwired (Official Music Video)

The first video from Metallica's upcoming album "Hardwired...To Self-Destruct" available everywhere on November 18. Pre-order now at Metallica.com. item.title: Guns N' Roses Launch a Surprise Pop-Up Shop in West Hollywood Today
item.description:
Guns N' Roses Launch a Surprise Pop-Up Shop in West Hollywood Today

Guns N' Roses are back home in L.A. and rounding out the North American leg of their Not in This Lifetime Tour with two shows at Dodger Stadium, tonight and tomorrow. The anticipation is likely killing a slew of Angelenos today, and the most excited among them - merch money...

item.title: New Metallica Is Here: Watch Video for 'Hardwired' & Get New Album Details
item.description:
New Metallica Is Here: Watch Video for 'Hardwired' & Get New Album Details

Seven years and countless new music teases since their last studio album, Metallica has finally delivered on its intent to share new music in 2016. The long-awaited LP is called Hardwired...To Self-Destruct, and it's due Nov. 18 via Blackened Recordings, the band's own imprint, distributed through Universal.

item.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Dark Necessities [OFFICIAL VIDEO]
item.description:
Red Hot Chili Peppers - Dark Necessities [OFFICIAL VIDEO]

Watch the music video for "Dark Necessities" now!

item.title: STEVEN ADLER Performs With GUNS N' ROSES At Second Dodger Stadium Concert (Video)
item.description:
STEVEN ADLER Performs With GUNS N' ROSES At Second Dodger Stadium Concert (Video)

Drummer Steven Adler performed with GUNS N' ROSES for the third time on the "Not In This Lifetime" reunion tour earlier tonight (Friday, August 19) at Dodger Stadium in Los Angeles, California, where he once again joined the group onstage to play drums on "Out Ta Get Me" and "My Michelle".
